name: Carve
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You touch a 10 foot cube of stone or earth, increased by 5 feet for every 1 AP spent past the first, and manipulate it into any shape you please, destroying or creating matter as necessary.

If used to create spikes, creatures that are forcibly pushed into the spikes take an additional 3d12 piercing damage.
empower: Range becomes 60 feet. You can affect two areas at once, each area being the same size.
